title: Sophia Yi
text:
Sophia Yi is a 4th year undergraduate student at UCLA, studying Statistics & Data Science and Spanish. Her interests are in Biostatistics and public health. In her free time, she enjoys cafe-hopping and digital art (check out her Redbubble below!)

title: Recent Projects
